org.apache.flink.core.memory

类 MemorySegmentFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.core.memory.MemorySegmentFactory

  • @Internal
public class MemorySegmentFactory
extends Object
    A factory for memory segments. The purpose of this factory is to make sure that all memory segments for heap data are of the same type. That way, the runtime does not mix the various specializations of the MemorySegment. Not mixing them has shown to be beneficial to method specialization by the JIT and to overall performance.

    Note that this factory auto-initialized to use HeapMemorySegment, if a request to create a segment comes before the initialization.

    • 嵌套类概要

      A concrete factory for memory segments.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MemorySegmentFactory

        public MemorySegmentFactory()

    • 方法详细资料

      • wrap

        public static MemorySegment wrap(byte[] buffer)
        Creates a new memory segment that targets the given heap memory region. This method should be used to turn short lived byte arrays into memory segments.
        参数:
        buffer - The heap memory region.
        返回:
        A new memory segment that targets the given heap memory region.

      • allocateUnpooledSegment

        public static MemorySegment allocateUnpooledSegment(int size)
        Allocates some unpooled memory and creates a new memory segment that represents that memory.

        This method is similar to allocateUnpooledSegment(int, Object), but the memory segment will have null as the owner.

        参数:
        size - The size of the memory segment to allocate.
        返回:
        A new memory segment, backed by unpooled heap memory.

      • allocateUnpooledSegment

        public static MemorySegment allocateUnpooledSegment(int size,
                                                    Object owner)
        Allocates some unpooled memory and creates a new memory segment that represents that memory.

        This method is similar to allocateUnpooledSegment(int), but additionally sets the owner of the memory segment.

        参数:
        size - The size of the memory segment to allocate.
        owner - The owner to associate with the memory segment.
        返回:
        A new memory segment, backed by unpooled heap memory.

      • wrapPooledHeapMemory

        public static MemorySegment wrapPooledHeapMemory(byte[] memory,
                                                 Object owner)
        Creates a memory segment that wraps the given byte array.

        This method is intended to be used for components which pool memory and create memory segments around long-lived memory regions.

        参数:
        memory - The heap memory to be represented by the memory segment.
        owner - The owner to associate with the memory segment.
        返回:
        A new memory segment representing the given heap memory.

      • wrapPooledOffHeapMemory

        public static MemorySegment wrapPooledOffHeapMemory(ByteBuffer memory,
                                                    Object owner)
        Creates a memory segment that wraps the off-heap memory backing the given ByteBuffer. Note that the ByteBuffer needs to be a direct ByteBuffer.

        This method is intended to be used for components which pool memory and create memory segments around long-lived memory regions.

        参数:
        memory - The byte buffer with the off-heap memory to be represented by the memory segment.
        owner - The owner to associate with the memory segment.
        返回:
        A new memory segment representing the given off-heap memory.

      • initializeFactory

        public static void initializeFactory(MemorySegmentFactory.Factory f)
        Initializes this factory with the given concrete factory.
        参数:
        f - The concrete factory to use.
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown, if this factory has been initialized before.

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        Checks whether this memory segment factory has been initialized (with a type to produce).
        返回:
        True, if the factory has been initialized, false otherwise.

      • getFactory

        public static MemorySegmentFactory.Factory getFactory()
        Gets the factory. May return null, if the factory has not been initialized.
        返回:
        The factory, or null, if the factory has not been initialized.
